1_1GuYKebkQAqGJ4tNpNp4TD1UuoHHudCJLA.body: Although Zeronet is a P2P network of open, free and uncensorable websites and using Bitcoin cryptography, don't start it please. I don't encourage anybody to create any media with child pornographic contents but If you want to do that on Zeronet, you should really be discreet. You can't know people who are reading your post now. For example, I could be a police officer who is reading it. Above all, Zeronet is NOT an anonymous network. So, be careful !
